products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Taupe Brown Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A highly popular range, loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This soft brown roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories.
This roller blind with accompanying white components and brown fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Our roller blinds are value for money and easy to install.For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices.

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Mocha Brown Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Mocha Brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Mocha Brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.
Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

products.title: Splash Taupe Brown 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Taupe Brown 89mm Vertical Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Taupe Brown vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish.  A moisture-resistant medium mink brown fabric, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom.  With a variety of control and stacking options available on our headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At Swift Direct Blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.  This bespoke vertical blind comes with a 5 year guarantee, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Mocha Brown 89mm Vertical Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, our Splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds.  Splash Mocha Brown is a chic medium brown vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home.  This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this brown vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant! Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester

 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Mocha Brown Panel Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Mocha Brown Panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space.  This dark brown dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This brown panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!

products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Taupe Brown Panel Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Taupe Brown panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The light brown panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Taupe Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Taupe Brown Electric Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Taupe Brown electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The soft light brown roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2074 Fabric Colour: Taupe Brown Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Mocha Brown Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Mocha Brown Electric Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  
 
 This Splash Mocha Brown electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The dark bown of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This brown roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2130 Fabric Colour: Mocha Brown Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable White Headrail with Top or Face Fix Brackets.     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
